original_text:
Treasures of Fire: Scatter Pays
Una grafica semplice per un gioco carico di Bonus
La nuova slot targata Playson, Treasures of Fire, è ambientata nella tana di uno spaventoso drago sputafuoco. Nelle profondità della montagna si cela il nostro mostro alato, che sorveglia le sue uova da chiunque decida di rubarle. Lo scopo del gioco è proprio questo. Più uova riuscirai a trafugare, più alte saranno le vincite!
La grafica di Treasures of Fire è abbastanza semplice, con il colore rosso a farla da padrone. La griglia al centro del gioco è sorvegliata dal drago, ma questa non ha una funzione meramente grafica. Infatti, in modo casuale, attiverà un Bonus di cui parleremo più avanti. I tasti per le giocate sono di grandi dimensioni e sono abbastanza distanti dalla griglia.
Caratteristiche di Treasures of Fire
La griglia è leggermente più grande rispetto al solito, avendo 6 bobine e 5 righe. I meccanismo di gioco è a cascata, quindi ogni volta che si crea una combo vincente, i simboli paganti vengono rimossi e sostituti da altri del tutto nuovi. Per vincere è necessario creare file di almeno otto simboli identici. La puntata minima è di 0,10 € e la vincita massima è pari a ben 20.000 volte la scommessa!
La funzione Autoplay ci permette di giocare senza cliccare ogni volta il tasto Start e si possono impostare da 5 a 999 giri automatici. Il tasto del fulmine serve invece ad accelerare la caduta dei simboli.
Concludiamo la descrizione con la volatilità, in questo caso alta, e il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) che qui corrisponde a un buon 95,5%.
Come vincere a Treasures of Fire
Le gemme colorate sono i simboli di valore più basso, mentre le uova del drago pagano molto di più. Quello che vale più in assoluto è l’uovo prossimo alla schiusa, con il cucciolo di drago visibile sotto il guscio. I simboli pagano in qualsiasi posizione sui rulli. L’occhio del drago è il nostro Scatter e ci ricompensa con dei giri gratis, da un minimo di 10 a un massimo di 20.
Se durante i Free Spins atterreranno altri 3 simboli Scatter, otterremo 5 ulteriori giri bonus. Altra funzione interessante è quella denominata Respiro del Fuoco, che concede moltiplicatori da applicare alle vincite.
Ma i moltiplicatori sono presenti anche nel gioco base. Infatti, di tanto in tanto e in modo del tutto casuale i simboli possono essere accompagnati da un moltiplicatore compreso tra 2x e 100x.
 

Domande Frequenti 
Posso provare Treasures of Fire prima di giocare soldi veri?

Certo, sul nostro sito è disponibile la versione DEMO che permette di giocare senza spendere, così da familiarizzare con il gioco.



Com’è la volatilità?

In Treasures of Fire è alta, si vince meno di frequente ma sempre cifre molto alte.



Quanto è la vincita massima?

In Treasures of Fire si può vincere fino a un massimo di 20.000 volte il valore della puntata.

raw_translation.response:
Treasures of Fire: Scatter Pays

A simple graphic for a game full of bonuses

The new slot game by Playson, Treasures of Fire, is set in the den of a fearsome fire-breathing dragon. Our winged monster lurks in the depths of the mountain, guarding its eggs from anyone who dares to steal them. The aim of the game is just that. The more eggs you manage to steal, the higher your winnings will be!

The graphics for Treasures of Fire are quite simple, with red being the dominant color. The grid at the center of the game is watched over by the dragon, but it serves a functional purpose rather than just being decorative. In fact, the dragon will randomly activate a bonus feature, which we will discuss later. The buttons for placing your bets are large and spaced quite far apart from the grid.

Features of Treasures of Fire

The grid is slightly larger than usual, featuring 6 reels and 5 rows. The gameplay mechanism is cascading, so every time a winning combination is created, the paying symbols are removed and replaced with brand new ones. To win, you need to create rows of at least eight identical symbols. The minimum bet is 0.10 € and the maximum payout is 20,000 times the bet!

The Autoplay feature allows you to play without clicking the Start button every time, and you can set between 5 and 999 automatic spins. The lightning button, on the other hand, accelerates the speed at which the symbols fall.

We can conclude the description with the volatility, which is high in this case, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) which equals a respectable 95.5%.

How to win at Treasures of Fire

The colored gems are the symbols with the lowest value, while the dragon eggs pay much more. The most valuable symbol of all is the egg that is about to hatch, with the baby dragon visible inside the shell. The symbols pay out in any position on the reels. The dragon's eye is our Scatter symbol and it rewards us with free spins, ranging from a minimum of 10 to a maximum of 20.

If during the Free Spins round, three more Scatter symbols land, we will get an additional 5 bonus spins. Another interesting feature is called Fire Breath, which grants multipliers to apply to our winnings.

But multipliers are also present in the base game. In fact, from time to time and completely randomly, the symbols can be accompanied by a multiplier ranging from 2x to 100x.

FAQ

Can I try Treasures of Fire before playing with real money?

Of course, on our website, you can find the demo version that allows you to play without spending real money, so you can get familiar with the game.

What is the volatility like?

In Treasures of Fire, the volatility is high, so you win less often but when you do, you win big.

What is the maximum payout?

In Treasures of Fire, you can win up to a maximum of 20,000 times the value of your bet.

A simple graphic for a game full of bonuses

The new slot game by Playson, Treasures of Fire, is set in the den of a fearsome fire-breathing dragon. Our winged monster lurks in the depths of the mountain, guarding its eggs from anyone who dares to steal them. The aim of the game is just that. The more eggs you manage to steal, the higher your winnings will be!

The graphics for Treasures of Fire are quite simple, with red being the dominant color. The grid at the center of the game is watched over by the dragon, but it serves a functional purpose rather than just being decorative. In fact, the dragon will randomly activate a bonus feature, which we will discuss later. The buttons for placing your bets are large and spaced quite far apart from the grid.

Features of Treasures of Fire

The grid is slightly larger than usual, featuring 6 reels and 5 rows. The gameplay mechanism is cascading, so every time a winning combination is created, the paying symbols are removed and replaced with brand new ones. To win, you need to create rows of at least eight identical symbols. The minimum bet is 0.10 € and the maximum payout is 20,000 times the bet!

The Autoplay feature allows you to play without clicking the Start button every time, and you can set between 5 and 999 automatic spins. The lightning button, on the other hand, accelerates the speed at which the symbols fall.

We can conclude the description with the volatility, which is high in this case, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) which equals a respectable 95.5%.

How to win at Treasures of Fire

The colored gems are the symbols with the lowest value, while the dragon eggs pay much more. The most valuable symbol of all is the egg that is about to hatch, with the baby dragon visible inside the shell. The symbols pay out in any position on the reels. The dragon's eye is our Scatter symbol and it rewards us with free spins, ranging from a minimum of 10 to a maximum of 20.

If during the Free Spins round, three more Scatter symbols land, we will get an additional 5 bonus spins. Another interesting feature is called Fire Breath, which grants multipliers to apply to our winnings.

But multipliers are also present in the base game. In fact, from time to time and completely randomly, the symbols can be accompanied by a multiplier ranging from 2x to 100x.

FAQ

Can I try Treasures of Fire before playing with real money?

Of course, on our website, you can find the demo version that allows you to play without spending real money, so you can get familiar with the game.

In Treasures of Fire, the volatility is high, so you win less often but when you do, you win big.

In Treasures of Fire, you can win up to a maximum of 20,000 times the value of your bet.
